Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is a point and click adventure by Valve.

Its the fourth game in the series after its controversial predecessor Counter-Strike: Source. It adds up on the story, clearing some of the great mysteries the earlier games set up and really enhances the gameplay with new mechanics like the Molotov function, two new characters called the CZ-75 and R8 Revolver and a lot of new puzzles in new landscapes.

While the Coop aspect tends to be shaky, especially when you don't bring a friend, its still great fun to play with others.

Valve also tends to update the game with new chapters and stories, so it always stays fresh.
